name: 葉賜旭
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、方塊圖與訊號流程圖、物理系統的數學模式、線性控制系統的穩定性分析、控制系統的時域分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析。實習項目：Visim介紹與應用、直流馬達PID速度控制、直流馬達PID位置控制。
schedule:
Introduction
Mathematical Foundation
Block Diagrams and Signal-Flow Graphs
Modeling of Physical Systems
Stability of Linear Control Systems
Time-Domain Analysis of Control Systems
Root-Locus Technique
Frequency-Domain Analysis
Experiment #1
Experiment #2
Experiment #3
scorePolicy: 期中考, 期末考, 實驗, 作業
materials: Automatic Control Systems, B. C. Kuo and F. Golnaraghi, WILEY, 8th ed.
